name: **SHIVERWRISTS** 6 Track EP w/ two free tracks!!
description:
The Debut EP from ‘Telephone Bruises’ All Music & Lyrics by Daveit Ferris Produced By Ryan Mitchell
This Package Includes.. -All The Ep Tracks 1. Gravity 2. Hearts In The Hospital 3. PhotoBooth Smiles 4. I Am Buzz Lightyear 5. New Year 6. Crashlanding
- High Resolution Front and Back Covers
- Full Lyrics
- TWO exclusive Tracks From the ‘Shiverwrists’ Sessions…............ ‘Hollywood Isnt Listening’ & ‘My Bloodstream’
HOW WILL I GET WHAT I PAID FOR? Upon receiving your payment, you will be promptly emailed (to your paypal/credit email address), a web link for you to visit and download your copy of ‘SHIVERWRISTS’. This will be in .zip format, and it will contain all the EP TRACKS, TWO EXCLUSIVE TRACKS, PRESS RELEASE, LYRICS, AND ARTWORK. ANY Questions/Problems can be directed to daveitferris@gmail.com THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR YOUR SUPPORT DAVEIT/SHAUN/AARON/MUTE/LEE
